architecture.frontend: Next.js (React) with client components for UX
architecture.backend: Next.js API Routes integrated with Supabase
architecture.auth: Slack OAuth with bot and user token storage
architecture.environment: .env variables for API keys and URLs

project_rules: No automatic refactors without user approval
Preserve existing functions and agent.js as read-only
Patch files instead of full rewrites when possible
Memory of decisions stored separately and immutable unless explicitly updated
Strictly separate chat from plan and execute modes
architecture_decisions: Use memory.json for chat memory only, decisions logged in markdown file
Index files and select minimal context for prompts
